text: Sacrifice (2010) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). It was held on May 16, 2010 at the TNA Impact! Zone in Orlando, Florida. It was the sixth Sacrifice event that TNA held. There were nine matches on the card. The main event saw Rob Van Dam defeat A.J. Styles to retain the TNA World Heavyweight Championship. ==Matches== # Results Stipulations Times 1 The Motor City Machine Guns (Alex Shelley and Chris Sabin) defeated Beer Money, Inc. (James Storm and Robert Roode) and Team 3D (Brother Devon and Brother Ray) Three-way tag team match to become the #1 contenders for the TNA World Tag Team Championship 13:13 2 Rob Terry (c) defeated Orlando Jordan Singles match for the TNA Global Championship 7:45 3 Douglas Williams defeated Kazarian (c) Singles match for the TNA X Division Championship 13:50 4 Madison Rayne (c) defeated Tara Title vs. Career match for the TNA Women's Knockout Championship 6:28 5 The Band (Kevin Nash and Scott Hall) (c) defeated Ink Inc. (Jesse Neal and Shannon Moore) Tag team match for the TNA World Tag Team Championship 8:47 6 Abyss defeated Desmond Wolfe (with Chelsea) Chelsea vs. Ring match; If Abyss won, he would get Chelsea's services for 30 days and if Wolfe won, he would have received Hulk Hogan's Hall of Fame ring. 9:27 7 Jeff Hardy defeated Mr. Anderson Singles match 13:57 8 Sting defeated Jeff Jarrett Singles match 0:14 9 Rob Van Dam (c) defeated A.J. Styles (with Ric Flair) Singles match for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship 24:47 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official TNA Sacrifice website Category:2010 in American television Category:2010 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Orlando, Florida Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling pay-per-view events Category:2010s in Orlando, Florida Category:May 2010 events
title: Sacrifice (2010)
